posts.content:
Does anyone have any leads on a complete non-walk through westy so42 interior?

I've put an ad in the wanted section, but thought it worth asking here too!

Regards,

Ollie

bus.racer(at)yahoo(dot)com

Hi Ollie, they are really hard to find , I bought my first split a few years ago which is a SO42 and I sold the interior which I often wonder if I have done the right thing but as my retired father who is very ill wanted to build me a bespoke interior in oak I couldn't resist and the end result is fantastic. The interior I sold had very small holes drilled all over it as the previous owner was a locksmith in Albuquergue and had key blanks hanging everywhere, that interior complete sold for best part of Â£2000 the interest I had in it was immense , even now nearly 2 years later I have the occasional email asking if I have any bits left.
Regards Iain.
